channel.title: Hands models system
channel.description: I noticed that the existing system for the hands is very bad for developers of mods. A lot of modifications conflict with each other. I think you need to make a separate animation for the weapons and animation for every single hand. It can be added to modify the arms and weapons without problems. You can add individual playermodels with their hands and describe it in the script
